languages.text: "Хотел{mf||а} отметить доблесть вашего офицера, сержанта Малгара. Он и его люди отважно защищают звездную гавань".
"I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."
languages.original_text: "Хотел{mf||а} отметить доблесть вашего офицера, сержанта Малгара. Он и его люди отважно защищают звездную гавань".

traits.locale_text: "I would like to note the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers have put up a valiant defence of the celestial harbour."
"I would like to note the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers have put up a valiant defence of the celestial harbour."
"I would like to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."
"I would like to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."
"I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."
"I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."

languages.text: "Ich möchte den Mut eines Eurer Offiziere loben, Sergeant Malgar. Er und seine Soldaten haben den Raumhafen tapfer verteidigt."
languages.original_text: "I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte den Mut eines Eurer Offiziere loben, Sergeant Malgar. Er und seine Soldaten haben den Raumhafen tapfer verteidigt."

languages.text: « J'aimerais saluer le courage de l'un de vos officiers, le sergent Malgar. Ses soldats et lui ont vaillamment défendu l'astroport. »
languages.original_text: "I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."

traits.locale_text: « J'aimerais saluer le courage de l'un de vos officiers, le sergent Malgar. Ses soldats et lui ont vaillamment défendu l'astroport. »

languages.text: “我要表扬你手下的一位军官，马尔加军士。他和他的士兵勇敢地保卫了星港。”
languages.original_text: "I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."

traits.locale_text: “我要表扬你手下的一位军官，马尔加军士。他和他的士兵勇敢地保卫了星港。”

languages.text: 「マルガー軍曹の勇気を称えたい。彼とその兵士達は、勇敢にもスターポートを守っている」
languages.original_text: "I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."

traits.locale_text: 「マルガー軍曹の勇気を称えたい。彼とその兵士達は、勇敢にもスターポートを守っている」

languages.text: «Me gustaría elogiar el valor de uno de sus oficiales, el Sargento Malgar. Él y sus soldados defienden valientemente el puerto estelar».
languages.original_text: "I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."

traits.locale_text: «Me gustaría elogiar el valor de uno de sus oficiales, el Sargento Malgar. Él y sus soldados defienden valientemente el puerto estelar».

languages.text: "Subaylarınızdan Çavuş Malgar'ın cesaretini övmek isterim. O ve askerleri, yıldız limanını yiğitçe savunuyor."
languages.original_text: "I wish to commend the courage of one of your officers, Sergeant Malgar. He and his soldiers valiantly defend the starport."

traits.locale_text: "Subaylarınızdan Çavuş Malgar'ın cesaretini övmek isterim. O ve askerleri, yıldız limanını yiğitçe savunuyor."
